author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is doing some work to help better define what we mean by innovation (lots of conversations about small projects vs. huge changes and what we mean by each), and also looking at ways we can reignite the “big change culture”. 
One of the topics they’re looking at has to do with starting up an innovation fund.  We realize that sometimes innovation pays off in non-financial ways, and that it would still be worth a financial investment to make it happen, so we would like to develop a program that better reflects what we are trying to accomplishment.
Interest to learn how you fund your innovation teams; please send information, documents, etc. to the following:
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Funding Innovation Teams
